Texts.Eng: If you have stacks of loose grit like silt, gravel or other powdery materials then just toss them in a ^orange;Sifter^reset; and you can pull resources right out of them! Build a ^orange;Sifter^reset; now.
Wooden sifters are terribly inefficient and slow, so as soon as you can I advice upgrading to a ^orange;Powder Sifter^reset; at an Electronics Center.
